table.name: vtiger_discountline
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_discountline` ( `discountlineid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `discountline_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `accountid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `dlcategory` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `discount` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`discountlineid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_discountlinecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_discountlinecf` ( `discountlineid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`discountlineid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
